item.title: Capcut Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
As a CapCut Video Post Editor for 1-Minute AI Videos, you will be responsible for assembling and editing short-form video content. You will work with AI-generated images, load them into CapCut, and refine the videos by zooming in, aligning images, adding transitions, cutting out audio blanks, and adding captions using Zeed.

Key Responsibilities:

*Load and organize AI-generated images into CapCut for video creation.
*Edit videos by zooming in and aligning images to ensure a cohesive and engaging visual flow.
*Add smooth transitions between images to enhance the overall viewer experience.
*Identify and cut out audio blanks or unnecessary pauses to improve audio quality.
*Add accurate and synchronized captions to videos using Zeed.
*Ensure the final 1-minute videos meet quality standards and align with the project’s vision.
*Collaborate with the creative team to ensure videos effectively convey the intended message within the 1-minute format.
*Stay updated on the latest CapCut features and editing techniques to continuously improve video quality.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 18:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, AI-Generated Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, AI Video Generator, AI Video Generation
Skills: CapCut, AI-Generated Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, AI Video Generator, AI Video Generation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for editorial team to mass produce videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am searching for a team including video editors, script writers and content researchers to work on a channel and mass produce 4 videos per day every day. this will be ongoing until i say to stop.

You will be responsible for script writing, content research including competitors, and then editing an final delivery of videos. I will give you the topics to write about.

These videos are very easy to produce and the rate is set but i can only discuss the rate during applications. the important part is that there is 4 videos per day.

They are mainly like real world news type of videos.

If you have a team and are looking to start working with an experienced channel owner then please reach out.

You must have the following:
-Scriptwriter who has very good english
-editor who can put videos together in a great way that follows the script
- elevenlabs voice access

One important key here is the english within the scripts and captions. you must at least use chat gpt to correct the scripts and add in all the joining words between sentences.

If you KNOW that you have the ability to do the above then please submit a proposal and upon interview i will discuss the rates.

So i know you have read this far and not just looked at the title and applied please start your proposal with the word 'ZEBRA'

Without this word at the start i will not even look at your proposal.

Thankyou.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 15, 2024 17:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Scriptwriting, Content Research
Skills: Video Editing, Scriptwriting, Content Research
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor [Bodycam Police Niche] - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Everyone! We're looking for a talented YouTube editor to join our team.

What We're Looking For:
- Experience: You should know how to create engaging YouTube Content. Understanding viewer retention is key – we need content that keeps people hooked.
- Availability: We have a lot of content, so there's plenty of work to go around. If you're good, we can offer you lots of projects.
- Skills: Quick turnaround times are essential. We also value eagerness to learn, as we will help you get the hang of our specific style.

Here are channels with a similar style to ours for you to get an idea of the type of work that we are looking for:
https://www.youtube.com/@DrInsanityCrime/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@X-Cop
https://www.youtube.com/@DetectiveWilliams/videos
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6wvxxHKW8KEnStASykvUbw

What We Offer:
- Flexible Hours: Work when it suits you. We're flexible as long as you meet deadlines.
- Negotiable Pay: We are willing to negotiate a price based off your skills. please note we are not looking for beginners, strictly expert video editors!

How to Apply:
- Show us some of your previous work with body cam or similar videos.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. We're excited to see what you can do!

Note: Make sure your application is simple, straightforward, and showcases your best work. We welcome editors from all backgrounds and look forward to seeing your creativity in action!



Budget: $4,500
Posted On: June 15, 2024 17:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Transition, Video Enhancement, Video Color Correction, Visual Effects, Adobe Creative Cloud, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Transition, Video Enhancement, Video Color Correction, Visual Effects, Adobe Creative Cloud, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Subscribe Monetize - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Tech Vlog YouTube Channel Growth Specialist to help us increase our subscribers and views. Need Subscribe watch hour monetize expert ,As a specialist, you will be responsible for implementing strategies to grow our channel's audience and engagement. This includes optimizing video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails, as well as improving video search rankings and recommending collaborations with other YouTubers. The ideal candidate should have experience in growing YouTube channels, a deep understanding of YouTube analytics, and knowledge of current trends in the tech vlogging industry.

  Skills required:
  - YouTube channel growth strategies
  - Video optimization
  - YouTube analytics
  - SEO for YouTube
  - Trend analysis
  - Collaboration outreach

  This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months.

  Expertise level: Intermediate

item.title: Real Estate Video Editor / Create a VIDEO TEMPLATE! - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create captivating video reels from photos for our real estate business.

We need to turn hundreds of real estate listings into videos.

You'll get the voiceover, the property images, and the description. Your task will be to create a template (essentially a standard video style) that we'll be able to reuse repeatedly by changing the property data. In other words, the transitions, the structure, the text elements, and the animations will remain the same; we just plug in one real estate listing after the other. Your job is to create a stunning template that will work reasonably well with hundreds of different properties.

Our videos will be 2 minutes long, so that's how long the template needs to be initially.

You'll be working with photos (on average 20-30 photos per listing), so what we need is somebody skilled enough to create an exciting video with transitions, texts, and effects that would keep the user's attention for 2 minutes, even though the underlying material is relatively static (as we are talking about 20-30 photos).

This is not your average video editing job—it's more of an interesting and creative exercise where you create a template that we can utilize over and over again.

If you enjoy doing something challenging and excited to help us turn relatively boring images into stunning and captivating videos, this is your opportunity! :)

We are easy to work with, always pay on time, and would be happy to receive your application!


Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 17:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Switzerland
click to apply
